722770.name: Captain Firebeard and the Bay of Crows OST and DC
722770.description:
Relive the swashbuckling fun and adventure of this game by purchasing the original soundtrack of this game! Included are the many entertaining music tracks that served as the background of the game. Featuring charming jigs and epic orchestral tracks you will find your mind swept away to the high seas!

Included with the soundtrack is the director’s commentary by Antonio Lorenzo Carino, the game’s Director, Writer and Composer. Get an inside view of the thought process and decision making behind making a game like “Captain Firebeard & The Bay of Crows”.

Tracks Included:

01 – Pirates on Deck
02 – Sneaking Around
03 – Battle near Trinidad
04 – Open Ocean Jig
05 – Moonlight on the Quarterdeck
06 – Fallen Comrade
07 – The Grand Manor
08 – Night Before the Raid
09 – The Bay of Crows
10 – Director’s Commentary
